meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael McCall Sarah Edwards Patrick Morrison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6323.

td.p: Michael McCall, a political consultant from Pompano Beach, Florida
Sarah Edwards, an attorney from Oakland, California
Patrick Morrison, a student of Slavic Studies from Northville, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,601)

tr.td: ABOLITIONISTS
HERE COMES THE WEDDING MOVIE
GOING DUTCH
COLLEGE TOWNS
(Alex: We want you to name the town where you find the main campus.)
HAI KARATE!
SCIENCE "L"AB

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On October 16, 1859 he & his followers slashed telegraph wires at Harpers Ferry to cut the town off from the outside world')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: On October 16, 1859 he & his followers slashed telegraph wires at Harpers Ferry to cut the town off from the outside world
